value:
$WmMPID_総選挙クロム,ch04_00_Chrom_M_ELECTION022,Face|If my power can be used to promote
peace, then I will happily go wherever
I am needed.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|...$k$p$WmMPID_アスク,ch00_42_Ask_M_Normal,Face_Smile|My, Alfonse, that is quite the serious
face you're wearing!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Ah, forgive me, Lord Askr. I was
lost in thought.$k$p$WmMPID_アスク,ch00_42_Ask_M_Normal,Face_Smile|You needn't apologize. While I am
a god, I fail to see the difference
that would separate us so.$k$pYou know...you remind me of Líf,
your ancestor. When we met, he
acted much like you do now.$k$pOver time, however, as we grew
close, he opened up and we
became friends.$k$pI hope that you will consider me
a friend one day as well.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Smile|Thank you, Lord Askr.$k$p$WmMPID_アスク,ch00_42_Ask_M_Normal,Face|You worry over your people who
have been enclosed in the darkness...$k$pYour people and your friend,
the princess.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Yes.$k$p$WmMPID_アスク,ch00_42_Ask_M_Normal,Face_Smile|Do not worry. With what we will
gain at the foot of Yggdrasill, you
should be able to save them all.$k$pI know it. With you and your friends
working to save them, I know it will
be all right. Everything will go well.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Lord Askr...$k$p$WmMPID_アスク,ch00_42_Ask_M_Normal,Face|Just watching you all, I feel so proud.
Líf's...my friend's descendants are
still helping the world.$k$pYou carry my power for opening
gateways and Líf's concern and
care for people.$k$pI hope your children and their
children will continue to care for
the world just as you do now.$k$p$Sbs150|
